document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Death </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">supple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Suitor </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">wins </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">last </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">stealthy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Wooing </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Conducted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">pallid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">innuendoes </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">dim </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">approach </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">brave </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">last </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Bugles </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">bisected </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Coach </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">bears </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">triumph </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Troth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">unknown </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Kinsmen </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">divulgeless </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">throngs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Down </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Death is the supple suitor
